entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 1:56 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 66 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
